about_the_game:
Discover an unforgettable story where deep bonds are tested amid intense battles.

In this DEMO version, you can experience the beginning of the most painful part, and at the same time, other various emotions, learnings and experiences in the life of the Heflitian Girl Sutelz!

Note: The data is saved in the cloud storage, which can also be used in the purchased version of "Kimi sae Ireba Episode Sutelz".
detailed_description:
Discover an unforgettable story where deep bonds are tested amid intense battles.

In this DEMO version, you can experience the beginning of the most painful part, and at the same time, other various emotions, learnings and experiences in the life of the Heflitian Girl Sutelz!

Note: The data is saved in the cloud storage, which can also be used in the purchased version of "Kimi sae Ireba Episode Sutelz".
name: Kimi sae Ireba Episode Sutelz DEMO
short_description: The Heflitian Girl's past is about to be revealed! This is a Drama and Action Adventure with a deep story and mysteries originating from an ancient planet... Planet Earth, which was destroyed and forgotten...
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
